LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
Steps to configure PostFinance eCommerce:

  1. Click Technical information in your PostFinance account administration.
  2. Settings under Global security parameters
    • Compose the string to be hashed...: Each parameter followed by the passphrase
    • Hash algorithm: SHA-1
    • Character encoding: Use the character encoding expected with the initial transaction request (depending on the URL called)
  3. Settings under Data and origin verification
    • URL of the merchant page...: http://www.yourStore.com (Your store URL)
    • SHA-IN pass phrase: ABCDEF0987654321 (freely definable password, containing at least 16 characters)
  4. Settings under Transaction feedback
    • Direct HTTP server-to-server request: Online but switch to a deferred request when the online requests fail
    • URL of the merchant's post-payment page: http://www.yourStore.com/Plugins/PaymentPostFinanceECommerce/PostSaleNotification for both input fields
    • Request method: POST
    • SHA-OUT pass phrase: ABCDEF0987654321 (freely definable password, containing at least 16 characters)
    • HTTP request for status changes: For each offline status change... and as URL enter http://www.yourStore.com/Plugins/PaymentPostFinanceECommerce/PostSaleNotification again
